data.text:
This article is about the episode. You may be looking for the VHS.

"Hoops and Drums" Season 1, Episode 12 Original airdate November 9, 2004 Location Lander, Wyoming Credits Writer Billy Aronson

Stephanie Simpson Live-action editor Daniel Gaucher Field producer Simon Griffith

Valerie Griffith Storyboard artist Elie Klimos Episode guide Previous episode Next episode "Rock 'n' Roll" "Swimming in the Desert"

"Hoops and Drums" is the twelfth episode in the first season of Postcards from Buster.

Summary[]

Buster travels to the Wind River reservation and learns of its native American traditions. He also learns that basketball is another important tradition and he participates in it with Stevan.
